Shiloh Villa Estate WILL MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE
soaring over the world

Set on the southern Caribbean coast of Anguilla, Shiloh Estate offers exceptional luxury and five-star services. The private, gated community of the Aurora Anguilla Resort & Golf Club is the perfect environment for blissful island living.

Features
  • 2 King bedrooms with ensuite marble bathrooms
  • 2 Queen bedrooms with ensuite marble bathrooms
  • Walk-in Closets
  • Molton Brown bathroom amenities
  • 2 Living rooms adjacent to a fully equipped kitchen
  • Washing machine & dryer
  • Dining room & reading room
  • Office
  • Garage
  • Pool & pool shower
  • Jacuzzi
  • Golf cart
  • High-speed Internet / wireless
  • Central Air Conditioning & Ceiling fans throughout
  • Flat Screen TV, cable TV
  • Safety deposits
  • Wine fridge & icemaker
  • Outside covered dining & BBQ
  • Outdoor day bed, seating, lounge chairs
  • Table tennis
  • Mosquito screens
  • Backup generator
Services
  • Daily housekeeping
  • Weekly change of bed linen and towels
  • Bi-weekly pool service & garden maintenance
  • 24/7 security throughout the resort grounds
  • Villa management, including personalised concierge service

You will be charmed by the luxury, style, and excitement of your vacation as you escape from your daily routine into the magnificent natural beauty of Anguilla. Ranked multiple times by Travel and Leisure as one of the top island destinations in the world, this magical place is sure to capture your heart.

Enjoy the resort’s outstanding amenities, including an 18-hole signature design Greg Norman championship golf course. Relax on a stunning beach or in the full-service SPA. Stay active on tennis courts and in the fitness center, taste local cuisine in top restaurants, and more. A private golf cart is at your disposal to explore the resort.

The four-bedroom villa located on Anguilla’s exclusive West End accommodates eight guests. The villa’s distinctive Greek-style architecture blends in perfectly with the tropical gardens that surround it. The contemporary interior is warm and welcoming, with lots of natural light and spacious rooms. 

The living spaces consist of two living rooms, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, a dining room, an office, and a reading room. The four bedrooms offer walk-in closets, ensuite marble bathrooms, and Molton Brown bathroom amenities. All bedrooms have access to a terrace, and the two bedrooms on the second floor offer views over the sea, the island of Sint Maarten, and the golf court.

Relax in the private infinity pool and outdoor jacuzzi or on one of the outdoor terraces with lounge chairs and day beds. The open-air dining gazebo with barbecue is the perfect place for cozy evening meals in the company of friends or family. 

The resort’s dedicated team is at your service to ensure that your stay is as comfortable and memorable as possible.

Guests can only use the complimentary estate’s golf cart within the resort grounds to access restaurants, golf, tennis courts, and the spa. The villa manager can make arrangements/bookings for those services at additional costs.

 

About the area

Anguilla was recently ranked as the #1 Caribbean Island in “Travel and Leisure’s 2020 World’s Best Awards,” making this the fourth year the island has taken the top ranking. In addition, Anguilla was named #7 on “Travel and Leisure’s Top 25 Best Islands in the World” for 2020. This is the second year in a row that Anguilla has been awarded this high distinction.

The island is a world-class, exclusive destination known for stunning white sand beaches, brilliant turquoise waters, a relaxed atmosphere with exceptional service, and a wide array of culinary choices. Anguilla offers 100+ dining outlets, from 5-star restaurants, cafés, beach joints, food trucks to over-the-top resorts, where internationally acclaimed and local chefs are cooking up an eclectic mix of global and island-style cuisine.

Anguilla is a perfect destination for families offering a safe, hospitable environment with a wealth of activities virtually all year long.
